content.text:
# 29th Golden Bell Awards

The 29th Golden Bell Awards () was held on 26 March 1994 at the Sun Yat-sen Memorial Hall in Taipei, Taiwan. The ceremony was broadcast by China Television (CTV).
Winners

|-
